          Okay, first it's St=
ranato's turn, he'll show you combat and stuff." Train Wreck said. The othe=
rs nodded and walked back into the base. Stranato turned to Infectra.

    =
      "So, first of all, if someone fires at you, use something for ptotect=
ion, you can grab a rock or something, because around here, lots of powerfu=
l weapons are used, stay away from Heavy Blaster Rifles if your not the one=
 holding them! Okay, watch this." Stranato said. He propped a dummy up on h=
is back. He swung his foot backwards and kicked the dummy in the groin. Str=
anato then hit a belly to belly suplex on the dummy.

          "Now, if so=
mething happens, like you getting into a bunch of trouble, play dead, they =
come close, bam! You blow their guts out!" Stranato said. Stranato fired hi=
s eye beams into the sky. Stranato did a moonsault from the top of a rock.
=

      =

s have autoguns and shields, watch out for them." Stranato said. Stranato h=
opped onto a rock.

          "Pick your weapons carefully, and never let y=
our guard down, your best friends could be your enemy!" Stranato said.

   =

ur own, but if the Autobots get destroyed, you cease to exist! Oh, yeah, ki=
ck ass and win Olympic Gold!" Stranato said. Stranato nodded and laughed...=

I'm no better than the cold! I don't understand why I did something like th=

oked at the body.

rk in his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in the corner.

 laughed.

 why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

on't know, but I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up =
behind Drazom slowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen =
from the People's Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Dra=

                              Stronghold and Blender took a si=

azy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons watching Stranato...

                                Train Wreck walked away from the battle, =
Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in contin=
uing the battle, ran off with them. Scamrock followed with a grunt from bei=
ng outnumbered. Artist laughed and ran after them as well.

               =
                 "Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!=
" Scamrock said.

                                "Who cares about you?" St=
ranato asked. Stronghold reached out to grab Stranato but he cartwheeled ou=
t of the way.

                                "We left that idiot Arrow in=
 your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

                           =
     "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

                                "It's my ba=
se, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired there and so are the other former R=
adicons!" Plintissa yelled.

                                The Radicons n=
odded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something that none of them, cou=
ld understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. The People's Base's s=
ecret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

                                =
"Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

                              =
  "What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

                                =
"Never mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water =
and ushered him to come along while he walked with his comrades.

         =
                       Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

   =
                             "Sorry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe Bright=
Blade will still show up anyway." Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona=
 flew away.

                                "Hey! Wait! You forgot to unti=
e meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

                                Dracona didn't=
 hear and landed next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plintiss=
a, Dracona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret pas=
sage way, the computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbombe=
r stepped into a door.

                                "Hey, Stranato, loo=
k at this! It's amazing!" Train Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR=
 Chamber all healed up.

                                "Yeah, it's got lo=
ts of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enough to put a table in t=
o play cards! How come we never noticed this room before?" Airbomber said. =
Stranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender followed.

          =
                      "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the ro=
om. Plintissa sealed the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the=
 Radicons were locked inside the room to sort out their problems. There was=
 alot of banging, but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Pli=
ntissa laughed and sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

       =
                         "Oh, man! Not even a drop of beer in here! We'll d=
ehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold said.

                               =
 "What are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

              =
                  "I have more needs than all of you idiots put together! I=
'm getting fat and need to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

                   =
             "How come we can't all get along! I don't like it in here neit=
her!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he was going to kill him. Arr=
ow cowered in the corner.

                                "You see? That's=
 why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid ru=
les! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

                             =
   "Yeah, and nobody is getting out of here until we are all friends again.=
" Airbomber said.

                                Stranato sighed in disap=
ointment. Arrow stood up again, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and=
 Blender started to look in cracks in the wall for something to drink, desp=
ite plenty of water in this room. Train Wreck was discussing something with=
 Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold and Blender joined them before long.

=
                                "Say, you guys, it's really lonely sitting =
here with nothing to do, and--"

                                "Shut up a=
nd get your ass over here! Of course you can join us!" Arrow said, cutting =
off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with them. Stronghold pulls out =
a pack of playing cards.

                                Plintissa and Dra=
cona smile to each other and walk up and out of the secret passgeway, takin=
g a walk across a field...
